OFFICIAL: Real Madrid C. F. announces that next Tuesday, July 16, at 12:00 p.m., the presentation of our player Kylian Mbappé will take place at the Santiago Bernabéu stadium.

Previously, the president of Real Madrid, Florentino Pérez, will receive Kylian Mbappé in the Ciudad Real Madrid for the protocol act of the firm that links our new player with the club for the next five seasons.

After the presentation, Kylian Mbappé will attend the media in the press room of the Santiago Bernabéu.
